originalText.text: This store carries the homeopathic remedies that I need for my cats. If they don't theyll order it and I can get it the next day. The only other place to go is Bigelow way downtown. David is polite and personable, knowledgeable about alternative medicine. Prices are reasonable. . I enjoy going to the store,  unlike many other stores

originalText.text:
I have shopped with David the owner long before opening this great store. He was head of a vitamin section of another store that clised.
Not only does David buy the best products, but he is also an encyclopedia of knowledge. His staff is fantastic too.

originalText.text:
A wonderful little shop conveniently located right next to Crunch gym (and a multitude of other fitness/wellness businesses in the area). As nearly every other review has stated, David, the owner, is extremely knowledgeable and capable of explaining nuanced differences between brands (ie  ingredient sourcing, absorption, etc). Speaking of brands, he carries top quality products that often are not found at the chain stores like Vitamin Shoppe and GNC, or grocery stores and pharmacies. It's clear a great deal of thought and care has gone into the selection the Vitamin Peddler stocks. Beyond that, the prices are extremely reasonable, sometimes even cheaper than Amazon or other online options, and if they happen to be a few dollars more, it's a small price to pay for the added value of David's wise consultations. Plus, you're supporting a neighborhood gem and genuinely great people who work very hard to do right by their customers.

If you've never stopped by the 'Peddler, you're missing out, even if you think you have all your supplementation needs already covered. Pop in and be pleasantly surprised.

originalText.text: I live in Brooklyn and didn’t know the store had to move. So when I stopped by and it was gone, I was like, “NOOOO!” Called and was relieved to hear David answer & get the new address. He’s kind, a health resource & with an affordable and well-stocked store. Thanx David!
